articles.description: Dell Alienware m15 R4 and Alienware m17 R4, as per the company’s announcement at CES 2021, will be refreshed with Nvidia GeForce RTX 30 series GPUs. It has not been confirmed exactly which GPUs will be powered these laptop models.
